main: ^You encountered a lone man slowly walking on the side of the road. He asks if you could kindly give him a ride to the nearest rest stop.
FirstChoice: ^You arrive at a gas station. As the man exits your car, he gives you a wad of cash as thanks!
SecondChoice: ^At 60+ MPH, you attempt to grab his wallet from your car window, injuring yourself and realizing this wasn't the best idea.
